transArray.content: The price is great, the layout is very safe, the bed is supported on three sides, and the space is saved. The facilities are 90% new, there is no peculiar smell in the room, and the bath water is very hot and will not slip. The surrounding environment is very quiet, parking is not very convenient. When I went there a year ago, the subway entrance was under maintenance, which was a little inconvenient. Except for these two points, others are very good.
